mapper.insert: insert into story_following(storyfollowing) values(#{whom}) where storywriter=#{storyWriter}
insert into story_follower(storyfollower) values(#{storyWriter}) where storyWriter=#{whom}
mapper.select: select * from story_following where storyWriter=#{storyWriter} and not exists( select * from story_following fw where fw.storyWriter = story_following.storyWriter and fw.storyfollowing = story_following.storyfollowing and fw.storyWriter = story_following.storyfollowing )
